description: Describes the Establishment APIs; the requests and responses based on primary types
title: ASCWDS Establishment API Schema

loginResponse.description: the login API response (on success); TODO - enforce the child attributes of establishment and mainService

isFirstLogin.description: true if this is the first time user has logged in

employerTypeGetResponse.description: Response to GET on Employer Type to an establishment (id assumed)

employerTypePostRequest.description: Request to assign an Employer Type to an establishment (id assumed)

employerTypePostResponse.description: Response to assign an Employer Type to an establishment (id assumed)

serviceGetResponse.description: the Get Services API response; can be empty. TODO: need to be able to mandate Service::name and Service::isCQC attributes on get

servicePostRequest.description: The Post Services API request; cannot be empty because it is the list of services for assumed (known) Establishment

services.description: A list of the services to be set against this known (authorised) establishment (note, only Service::id is mandatory)

serviceCapacityGetReponse.desctiption: The Get Service Capacity repsonse, being a list of service capacities by Service associated to the assumed (known) Establishment

items.description: The set of services (main and other) known to the Establishment. TODO: enforce isMainService, category and capacity attributes
